title: The Company Data Summary Domain Schema
description: Contains a summary of public registered information about an entity

StartDate.title: Starting date of the entity
StartDate.description: The entity started its activity in this day

FiledIn.title: Filed in
FiledIn.description: Place or administration where the events where filed

LastFilingDate.title: Date of Last Filing
LastFilingDate.description: The last time when the company filed their accounts, enrollments or any other documentation in the Companies Register or similar

FilingStatus.title: Filing Status
FilingStatus.description: Status of the accounts, enrollments or any other mandatory documentation requestes by the Companies Register or similar

LastDepositEnrollmentYear.title: Last year filled for balance accounts or enrollments
LastDepositEnrollmentYear.description: Depending on the country, this field shows the last year filed by the company concerning their annual accounts or similar (E.g. enrollments)

CurrentAddress.title: Current Address
CurrentAddress.description: Current legal address of the entity

CurrentAddressLastUpdate.title: Current Address' last update
CurrentAddressLastUpdate.description: The last time when the company set or changed its legal address

CurrentActivity.title: Current Activity
CurrentActivity.description: Current main activity of the entity

CurrentActivityLastUpdate.title: Current Activity's last update
CurrentActivityLastUpdate.description: The last time when the company set or changed its main activity

OtherDataList.title: List of Other Data
OtherDataList.description: Any other data relative to this publication

AnnualPublicationsList.title: List of Publications sorted by year
AnnualPublicationsList.description: List of years with publications or document filings concerning events related to the entity

Year.title: Publication year
Year.description: Year of the group of publications

TypeGroupsList.title: List of types or groups
TypeGroupsList.description: List of publications sorted by type or group

Type.title: Publication related type
Type.description: Act or event type that describe the subject of the event published

TypeGroup.title: Publication related group type
TypeGroup.description: Parent group for act or event types that describe the event's published subject

VendorTypeId.title: Vendor Type Id
VendorTypeId.description: Internal vendor code used to refer its specific act or event type

VendorTypeGroupId.title: Vendor Type Group Id
VendorTypeGroupId.description: Internal vendor code used to refer its specific parent act or event group type

Priority.title: Type priority
Priority.description: Marks the priority of the type amongst others. Higher the value, higher the prioriry

Detail.title: Type or group detail
Detail.description: Type or group detail: number of events, deposit year, etc.
